contentList.content: Strike out with a spinning kick at all nearby foes, making separate <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> against each target.
Step through the shadows, teleporting to an unoccupied space you can see.
Your force of will is unwavering. Your unarmed attacks deal an additional [1].

Can't be used at the same time as <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="Manifestation_of_Body">Manifestation of Body</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="Manifestation_of_Mind">Manifestation of Mind</LSTag>, or <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="Manifestation_of_Soul">Manifestation of Soul</LSTag>.
